author: NylaPop
XOHatsumi
install_msg:
Thank you for installing Bump Reminder. This requires the ForceMention cog to be installed and loaded from **this** repo.
`[p]cog install Phen-Cogs forcemention`
name: BumpReminder
short: Set a reminder to bump on Disboard.
description: Set a reminder to bump on Disboard.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores the number of times a member has bumped.
